org.springframework.data.repository

接口 PagingAndSortingRepository<T,ID>

  • 所有超级接口:
    CrudRepository<T,ID>, Repository<T,ID>

    @NoRepositoryBean
public interface PagingAndSortingRepository<T,ID>
extends CrudRepository<T,ID>
    Extension of CrudRepository to provide additional methods to retrieve entities using the pagination and sorting abstraction.
    另请参阅:
    Sort, Pageable, Page

    • 方法概要

      所有方法 实例方法 抽象方法 
      限定符和类型 方法和说明
      org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
      Returns a Page of entities meeting the paging restriction provided in the Pageable object.
      Iterable<T> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
      Returns all entities sorted by the given options.

      • 从接口继承的方法 org.springframework.data.repository.CrudRepository

        count, delete, deleteAll, deleteAll, deleteById, existsById, findAll, findAllById, findById, save, saveAll

    • 方法详细资料

      • findAll

        Iterable<T> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Sort sort)
        Returns all entities sorted by the given options.
        参数:
        sort -
        返回:
        all entities sorted by the given options

      • findAll

        org.springframework.data.domain.Page<T> findAll(org.springframework.data.domain.Pageable pageable)
        Returns a Page of entities meeting the paging restriction provided in the Pageable object.
        参数:
        pageable -
        返回:
        a page of entities
